Headline: No Trains Between Cermak and the Loop.
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Cermak and the Loop due to an unauthorized person on the tracks,

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Cermak and the Loop due to authorized person on the tracks .

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Harlem/Lake and the Loop, and,
  • between 63rd Ashland and Cermak, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. Shuttle buses are available between Cermak and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Halsted and the Loop
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Halsted and the Loop due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Halsted and the Loop due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Halsted andthe Loop, and,
  • between Midway and Halsted, only.

Shuttle buses have bwen requested  are available between Halsted and State/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
